text: Cea cng xya khab li brrda phu thi wingwxn tx phracea khxng phwk khea thang nı wela chea læa yen doy prarthna khwam pordpran cak phraxngkh mi pen phay kæ cea tæ xyang dı nı kar chara phwk khea læa k mi pen phay kæ phwk khea tæ xyang dı cak kar chara cea læw hetu dı cea cung ca khab li phwk khea (tha cea tha chen nan læw) cea k ca klay pen phu hnung nı hmu phu xthrrm
